modName: Adventurer-s house _ Cyrodiil - Hammerfell - Morrowind _ WIP
summary:
Cyrodiil, Hammerfell, Morrowind, ... you open three gates and can go now to the other side.
Three houses are prepared at three places for an adventurer.
You can enjoy the spectacular views.
descriptionHtml:
----------------
Adventurer\'s house \"Cyrodiil\" \"Hammerfell\" \"Morrowind\" (WIP)
----------------

This is MOD for enjoying the scenery of the other side of the border.
\"Border Regions\" is disabled.
Navmesh has newly been arranged in the wide range. 

Cyrodiil, Hammerfell, Morrowind, ... you open three gates and can go now to the other side.
Three houses are prepared at three places for an adventurer.
Please kill the monster which is near the house and get a key.
You can enjoy the spectacular views.


[color=red]Other worlds are the dangerous worlds whose ground is lost suddenly.
Please be sure to back up your save data.[/color]

---
Author : hdela


---
This mod was built with Skyrim US Ver 1.7.7.0.x

Master files : Skyrim.esm, Update.esm


---
Installation : Unzip the file, and overwrite Skyrim Data folder. Or drop the esp into your Skyrim Data directory.


---
Ver: WIP

All containers : no respawn


---
Enjoy!

by hdela
author: hdela
